championDetail.blurb: A nightmarish empress created from the raw material of an entire devoured city, Bel'Veth is the end of Runeterra itself... and the beginning of a monstrous reality of her own design. Driven by epochs of repurposed history, knowledge, and memories from...
championDetail.name: Bel'Veth

passive.description: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.
passive.name: Death in Lavender

spells.description: Bel'Veth dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through.
spells.name: Void Surge

spells.description: Bel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.
spells.name: Above and Below

spells.description: Bel'Veth roots herself in place, channeling a storm of slashes around her that targets the lowest-health enemy and grants her lifesteal and damage reduction.
spells.name: Royal Maelstrom

spells.description: Bel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat move speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora.
spells.name: Endless Banquet

championDetail.title: the Empress of the Void
